text: Botero is a surname of Spanish language origin common in Colombia. It means "bottler" or "boat owner". The surname can refer to the following people: == Art == *Fernando Botero (born 1932), Colombian figurative artist == Politics == *Beatriz Elena Uribe Botero, Colombian politician *Fernando Botero Zea (born 1956), Colombian politician == Sports == *Alejandro Botero (born 1980), Colombian footballer *Joaquín Botero (born 1977), Bolivian footballer *Juan Sebastián Botero (born 1986), Colombian-American footballer *Santiago Botero (born 1972), Colombian cyclist ==Other== *Giovanni Botero ( 1544 – 1617), Italian thinker, priest, poet, and diplomat *Juan Carlos Botero, Colombian legal researcher *Catalina Botero Marino, Colombian attorney *Naty Botero, Colombian model ==References==
title: Botero
